name: Cities and The Dead
description:
This is a short puzzle game set in a studio/gallery scene. There are three puzzles that the player needs to complete. In these puzzles, the player will need to remember and recreate sequences and find objects hidden in the scene.

Made in Unreal Engine 4.27

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1L2YgbfxrHw1jMVQI_9dJjqfX1PQPIyeWyMTbr8fRbO4/...

Reyhan Ismail 

lab 01
